  <description>
    <facet>

      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4777</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">3D Construction</string>
            <string language="es">Creación en 3D</string>
            <string language="ga">Tógáil 3T</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufbau 3D</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">construction 3D</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">construção 3D</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">costruzione 3D</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τρισδιάστατη κατασκευή</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Two examples of 3D Construction are given with information on the materials and methods used.</string>
            <string language="es">Se ofrecen dos ejemplos de creación de imágenes en 3D con información sobre los materiales y los métodos utilizados.</string>
            <string language="ga">Tugtar dhá shampla de Thógáil 3T le heolas ar na hábhair agus na modhanna a úsáidtear.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Art</string>
            <string language="es">Arte</string>
            <string language="ga">Ealaíon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Additional Resource</string>
            <string language="es">Recurso adicional</string>
            <string language="ga">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zwei Beispiele des Aufbaus 3D werden mit 
Informationen über die verwendeten Materialien und die Methoden 
gegeben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Deux exemples de la construction 3D sont donnés 
avec l'information sur les matières et les méthodes employées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dois exemplos da construção 3D são dados com 
informação nos materiais e nos métodos usados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Due esempi di costruzione 3D sono forniti con le 
informazioni sui materiali e sui metodi impiegati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύο παραδείγματα της τρισδιάστατης κατασκευής 
δίνονται με τις πληροφορίες για τα υλικά και τις μεθόδους 
χρησιμοποιούμενα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kunst</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusätzliches Hilfsmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Art</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource Supplémentaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Arte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa Supplementare</string>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόσθετο στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς</string>
          </keyword>
